A classic Carrot Layer Cake baked with freshly grated carrot, cinnamon, and walnut, topped with cream cheese frosting. It's light in taste which makes it a perfect tea cake.
A decadent cake of moist chocolate layers and creamy chocolate mousse topped with luscious chocolate ganache
